Nice choice of Telegram username Cause I'm making such projects, not means that I'm a scammer:)You are making a scam project but you're not a scammer how is it so, fish are caught in the mouth, your chosen usernames usually depict your intention and who you are, now how can people trust you, now that you exposed yourself for creating scam projects, I'm sure what you're promoting right now is another of your scam projects

comments.author: fortunecrypto
comments.body: You've claimed to have worked on many projects but look at your site security, this is the first thing that should be taken care of after you launch your site how can you not overlook it, considering that this is an investment site ad you are not good at hiding on your intention too who would trust a developer who admits that he has no regret in scamming people this is based on your words Quote from: coderxxx1l on December 19, 2022, 11:57:48 PMI mean I am... It's hard to explain I'm not a scammer with people I interact with, such as my teammates. Only with the large audience I want to scam:)Sorry guys for such a revelation

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Seems i am missing something here. Just trying to figure out the whole scenario going on here. Does it mean that one can just wake up from the cloud create an account and start scamming people? As I see OP is a new bee here without any platform knowledge of how things works best onboard this platform.  OP seems to have uploaded a scam site here for people to start patronizing his product but forget to know that this is not just an any how platform where you could just mess up with and go Scot free. It's not so here OP I must say you made the wrong calculation and also, you met the wrong people. OP o would suggest you go back to your drawing board to get a bigger and clearer picture of your project before coming back here.
